//fetch column totals
MarkCode special
Currency selection (Heller currency or Client currency)
23.03.2006 CO SCR10672: Added call to new task:
Update last settings as default for next time
-- Determine, if the user is allowed to modify the markcode
-- Basically modifications are only allowed if client currency is selected
... if the user has update permission on ODC006MCT then the user is allowed to
do all updates in field markcode text
... If the user has update permission on ODC006MCF then the user is allowed to
do all updates in field markcode finance and related fields
... if the user has update permission on ODC006MAXI then the user is allowed to
remove markcode finance if INVO_MARKCODESPEC = GNRL_MARKCODMAXINVAMOUNT
... if the user has update permission on ODC006IC23 then the user is allowed to
perform all markcode finance and related updates for debtors where
CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = Y and CLNT301_DUNNING = N
... if the user has update permission on ODC006NEW then the user is allowed to
set new markcodes finance and to modify the percentage

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select cast (sum(INVO_AWKAI) as numeric(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and INVO_AWKAI <> 0

Text.val: U = Currency changed
C = Cancel
Force Exit(s)
'' (Exit)
Force Exit(s)
U= Currency changed
-- Markcode special can be only removed, other changes are not allowed
-- Markcode special can be only set, other changes are not allowed
//markcode mandatory
//markcode_type=3 if INVA_ACTASPECIAL<>0
-- new INVO_MARKCODETEXT does not exists (Optional field)
- Write changes to DB_HISTORY
- Store changes to database
-- User is not allowed to decrease the percentage
